strategy: Type of strategy: centralized or federated

centralized.model_name: Name of the model class: Convolutional_NN, Multilayer_perceptron
centralized.data: path to the mnist data folder, if null data are download
centralized.distribution: path to clients_distribution.json, if null data are distributed

federated.model_name: Name of the model class: Convolutional_NN, Multilayer_perceptron
federated.data: path to the mnist data folder, if null data are download
federated.distribution: path to clients_distribution.json, if null data will be distribute
